title: The Archer of a Fictitious World - Novel Updates
tags: Archery   Female Protagonist   Gamers   MMORPG   Shy Characters   Virtual Reality
author: Kamameshi Yori Umareshi Otoko   釜飯より生まれし男
description: Sena Kohinata is a first-year high school student with extreme social anxiety, which left her friendless and alone. One day, she decides to play the game ‘Another Dimension World Online’ in order to help with her anxiety. She uses her experience in archery, which was her hobby and sharp hearing which she honed through being a loner, as she challenges herself with this VRMMO!>
